            if (adTargeting) {

                        value = value.map(function (el) {
                            return '' + el;
                        });
                    } else {
                        value = '' + value;
                    }
                    googletag.pubads().setTargeting(key, value);
                });

          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('header-login-module-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
          </script>

          //&lt;![CDATA[
  (function (domId) {
      var module = $(domId);
      module.down('.show-registration-form-button').observe('click', function(event) {
          event.preventDefault();
          new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationOverlay().show();
      });
  })('header-login-module');
//]]&gt;
         </script>

       <script type="text/javascript">
        //&lt;![CDATA[
            
            (function(showLogin) {
            
                if (showLogin) {
                    $('ep-site-header-login-link').up('.login-link-container').toggleClassName('show-login');
                }
            
                //login overlay
                $('ep-site-header-login-link').observe('click', function(event) {
                    event.preventDefault();
                    var linkContainer = event.findElement('.login-link-container');
                    if (linkContainer) {
                        linkContainer.toggleClassName('show-login');
                        linkContainer.down('#login_username-input').focus();
                    }
                });
            
                                        
            })();
            
          //]]&gt;
       </script>

                    EP.Event.on('member-logged-in', function() {

                            onSuccess: function(transport) {

       //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (divId, parentDivId) {
        googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display(divId); }); 
    
        var hideAdBtn = $(parentDivId).down('.hide-ad-button');
        if (hideAdBtn) {
            hideAdBtn.observe('click', function() {
                $(parentDivId).hide();
            });
        }

        //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('group-heading-group-join-unjoin-toggle', '233006');
  //]]&gt;
       </script>
      </div>

          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-1851793', '/stories/Love-Fantasy-Novels/1851793', '', 'Story');

         <div class="content">
          <h2 class="legacy-title">
           <a class="title" href="/stories/Love-Fantasy-Novels/1851793">
            Ahh, The Nostalgia
           </a>
          </h2>
          <span class="story-content">
           Although my tastes are a bit more varied now, back in the day I really got into reading I read almost 100%  fantasy. We have a long history together. I read almost all the time many years, but that changed when I got my own computer at the age of 14, hah.

Fantasy may not be as...
          </span>
         </div>
         <div class="foot">
          <span class="member">
           <a class="member-image titled-story-expression story-expression is-link " href="http://www.experienceproject.com/about/fearofsilence" mid="" title="Fearofsilence">

           </a>
           <span class="member-username-with-status">
            <a class="member-username " href="http://www.experienceproject.com/about/fearofsilence" mid="-293630977" title="See Fearofsilence's profile">

            <a class="member-premium-status " href="http://www.experienceproject.com/epsupporter" title="Fearofsilence is an EP Supporter">
            </a>
            <span class="user-online-status offline" title="">
            </span>
           </span>

            <span class="like-count " id="like-count-Story-1851793">
             <span class="count">
              0
             </span>
             <span class="icon">

             <span class="likers">
              <span class="tooltip-text">

            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-1851793', 
     'Story',
      1851793,
      0
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>
           </span>

            <span class="model-create-date">
             Oct 26, 2011

          <input id="" name="_csrf" type="hidden" value="31971ece466da267ead7f8d426696852"/>
          <span class="ep-form-status-msg ">
          </span>
          <div class="form-content">
           <input name="modelType" type="hidden" value="Story"/>
           <input name="modelId" type="hidden" value="1851793"/>
           <input class="action" name="action" type="hidden" value="like"/>
           <button class="icon-btn" title="Heart">
           </button>
          </div>
          <div class="form-actions">
          </div>
         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-1851793-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-1851793-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-1851793', 'respond-form-Story-1851793-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-1851793-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-1851793');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-1851793', 'respond-form-Story-1851793');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="expression titled-story-expression story-expression is-link " id="expression-story-4983105">
        <div class="expression-content">
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-4983105', '/stories/Love-Fantasy-Novels/4983105', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>
         <div class="content">
          <h2 class="legacy-title">
           <a class="title" href="/stories/Love-Fantasy-Novels/4983105">
            I love Diana Wynne Jones.
           </a>
          </h2>
          <span class="story-content">
           Her book, "Howl's Moving Castle, was just beautiful. It was different than any book I've ever read.
          </span>
         </div>

           <span class="likes">
            <span class="like-count " id="like-count-Story-4983105">
             <span class="count">
              0
             </span>
             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="likers">
              <span class="tooltip-text">
              </span>
              <span class="caret">
              </span>
             </span>
            </span>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-4983105', 
     'Story',
      4983105,
      0
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>
           </span>

            <span class="model-create-date">
             Oct 14, 2014
            </span>

           </span>

          </div>

         <form action="http://www.experienceproject.com/ajax/like" class="like-button-form like-story-form" enctype="" id="like-story-4983105-button-form" method="post">
          <input id="" name="_csrf" type="hidden" value="31971ece466da267ead7f8d426696852"/>
          <span class="ep-form-status-msg ">
          </span>
          <div class="form-content">
           <input name="modelType" type="hidden" value="Story"/>
           <input name="modelId" type="hidden" value="4983105"/>
           <input class="action" name="action" type="hidden" value="like"/>
           <button class="icon-btn" title="Heart">
           </button>
          </div>
          <div class="form-actions">
          </div>
         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-4983105-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-4983105-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-4983105', 'respond-form-Story-4983105-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-4983105-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-4983105');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-4983105', 'respond-form-Story-4983105');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="expression titled-story-expression story-expression is-link " id="expression-story-636361">

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-636361', '/stories/Love-Fantasy-Novels/636361', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>
         <div class="content">
          <h2 class="legacy-title">
           <a class="title" href="/stories/Love-Fantasy-Novels/636361">
            Fantasy Novels Are Wonderful!!
           </a>
          </h2>
          <span class="story-content">
           I am definitely a reader of many different authors, most of them write in the Fantasy genre.
A few favorite authors of mine would be: David and Leigh Eddings, Melanie Rawn, Mercedes Lackey, Piers Anthony, Robin Hobb, Anne McCaffrey, and a few others. It helps to pass the time at...
          </span>
         </div>
         <div class="foot">
          <span class="member">
           <a class="member-image titled-story-expression story-expression is-link " href="http://www.experienceproject.com/about/forestgnome" mid="" title="Forestgnome">
            <img alt="Forestgnome" height="175" src="http://m.epcdn.net/member_ups/avatar_male.jpg" width="175"/>
           </a>
           <span class="member-username-with-status">
            <a class="member-username " href="http://www.experienceproject.com/about/forestgnome" mid="-373057782" title="See Forestgnome's profile">

            </span>
           </span>

           </span>
          </span>

            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-636361', 
     'Story',
      636361,
      0
  );

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-636361-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>
         <form action="http://www.experienceproject.com/ajax/respond" class="respond-form indicate-loading " enctype="" id="respond-form-Story-636361" method="post">
          <input id="" name="_csrf" type="hidden" value="31971ece466da267ead7f8d426696852"/>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-636361-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-636361', 'respond-form-Story-636361-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-636361-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-636361');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-636361', 'respond-form-Story-636361');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>

        <script type="text/javascript">
         //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function() {
          var params =
          {
              id: "8d1c83bd-80e8-471b-9187-548a78a36894",
              d:  "ZXhwZXJpZW5jZXByb2plY3QuY29t",
              wid: "10075",
              cb: (new Date()).getTime()
          };
      
          var qs="";
          for(var key in params){qs+=key+"="+params[key]+"&amp;";}
          qs=qs.substring(0,qs.length-1);
          var s = document.createElement("script");
          s.type= 'text/javascript';
          s.src = "http://api.content.ad/Scripts/widget.aspx?" + qs;
          s.async = true;
          s.onload = function() {
              if (typeof(jQuery) != 'undefined') {
                  jQuery.noConflict();
              }
          };
          document.getElementById("contentad10075").appendChild(s);
      })();
    //]]&gt;

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-5451562', '/stories/Love-Fantasy-Novels/5451562', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>
         <div class="content">
          <h2 class="legacy-title">
           <a class="title" href="/stories/Love-Fantasy-Novels/5451562">
            I started reading in my teens
           </a>
          </h2>
          <span class="story-content">
           once I discovered the Fantasy genre thanks to James Pattersons Maximum Ride novels, then I expanded to Rick Riordans Percy Jackson and Heroes of Olympus series to delve into my love for Greek Mythology I have had from what I could remember starting from the cartoon...
          </span>
         </div>

          <span class="member">

           <span class="likes">
            <span class="like-count " id="like-count-Story-5451562">
             <span class="count">
              0
             </span>
             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="likers">
              <span class="tooltip-text">
              </span>
              <span class="caret">
              </span>
             </span>
            </span>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-5451562', 
     'Story',
      5451562,
      0
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>
           </span>

            <span class="model-create-date">
             Feb 1
            </span>
           </span>
           <span class="category">
           </span>
          </span>

          </div>
         </div>

         </div>

         <form action="http://www.experienceproject.com/ajax/like" class="like-button-form like-story-form" enctype="" id="like-story-5451562-button-form" method="post">
          <input id="" name="_csrf" type="hidden" value="31971ece466da267ead7f8d426696852"/>
          <span class="ep-form-status-msg ">
          </span>
          <div class="form-content">
           <input name="modelType" type="hidden" value="Story"/>
           <input name="modelId" type="hidden" value="5451562"/>
           <input class="action" name="action" type="hidden" value="like"/>
           <button class="icon-btn" title="Heart">
           </button>
          </div>
          <div class="form-actions">
          </div>
         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-5451562-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

         <!-- can't put this behind autoinstantiate js as this is always true for this textfield -->
         <!-- and it would show up in three places where respond-form is called -->

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-5451562-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-5451562', 'respond-form-Story-5451562-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-5451562-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-5451562');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-5451562', 'respond-form-Story-5451562');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="expression titled-story-expression story-expression is-link " id="expression-story-813680">
        <div class="expression-content">
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-813680', '/stories/Love-Fantasy-Novels/813680', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>
         <div class="content">
          <h2 class="legacy-title">
           <a class="title" href="/stories/Love-Fantasy-Novels/813680">
            My Own Little World
           </a>
          </h2>
          <span class="story-content">
           Like everyone, I've read LOTR and loved it. the Hobbit is good too. And i think Tolkien is my favourite author because of the dedication to his work and the world he created.
My current favourite author is James Clemens and his Wit'ch Fire series. I'm thinking of adopting that...
          </span>
         </div>
         <div class="foot">
          <span class="member">
           <a class="member-image titled-story-expression story-expression is-link " href="http://www.experienceproject.com/about/jiyuunatori" mid="" title="jiyuunatori">

           </a>
           <span class="member-username-with-status">

            </a>
            <span class="user-online-status offline" title="">
            </span>
           </span>

           <span class="likes">
            <span class="like-count " id="like-count-Story-813680">
             <span class="count">
              0
             </span>
             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="likers">
              <span class="tooltip-text">
              </span>
              <span class="caret">
              </span>
             </span>
            </span>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-813680', 
     'Story',
      813680,
      0
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>
           </span>

            <span class="model-create-date">
             Dec 5, 2009
            </span>
           </span>

           </span>

         <form action="http://www.experienceproject.com/ajax/like" class="like-button-form like-story-form" enctype="" id="like-story-813680-button-form" method="post">
          <input id="" name="_csrf" type="hidden" value="31971ece466da267ead7f8d426696852"/>
          <span class="ep-form-status-msg ">
          </span>
          <div class="form-content">
           <input name="modelType" type="hidden" value="Story"/>
           <input name="modelId" type="hidden" value="813680"/>
           <input class="action" name="action" type="hidden" value="like"/>
           <button class="icon-btn" title="Heart">
           </button>
          </div>
          <div class="form-actions">
          </div>
         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-813680-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-813680-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-813680', 'respond-form-Story-813680-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-813680-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-813680');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-813680', 'respond-form-Story-813680');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="expression titled-story-expression story-expression is-link " id="expression-story-5531230">
        <div class="expression-content">
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-5531230', '/stories/Love-Fantasy-Novels/5531230', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>
         <div class="content">
          <h2 class="legacy-title">
           <a class="title" href="/stories/Love-Fantasy-Novels/5531230">
            I started reading in my teens
           </a>
          </h2>
          <span class="story-content">
           once I discovered the Fantasy genre thanks to James Pattersons Maximum Ride novels, then I expanded to Rick Riordans Percy Jackson and Heroes of Olympus series to delve into my love for Greek Mythology I have had from what I could remember starting from the cartoon...
          </span>

           <span class="likes">
            <span class="like-count " id="like-count-Story-5531230">
             <span class="count">
              0
             </span>
             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="likers">
              <span class="tooltip-text">
              </span>
              <span class="caret">
              </span>
             </span>
            </span>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-5531230', 
     'Story',
      5531230,
      0
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>
           </span>

            <span class="model-create-date">
             Feb 23
            </span>
           </span>

         <form action="http://www.experienceproject.com/ajax/like" class="like-button-form like-story-form" enctype="" id="like-story-5531230-button-form" method="post">
          <input id="" name="_csrf" type="hidden" value="31971ece466da267ead7f8d426696852"/>
          <span class="ep-form-status-msg ">
          </span>
          <div class="form-content">
           <input name="modelType" type="hidden" value="Story"/>
           <input name="modelId" type="hidden" value="5531230"/>
           <input class="action" name="action" type="hidden" value="like"/>
           <button class="icon-btn" title="Heart">
           </button>
          </div>
          <div class="form-actions">
          </div>
         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-5531230-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-5531230-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-5531230', 'respond-form-Story-5531230-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-5531230-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-5531230');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-5531230', 'respond-form-Story-5531230');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>

        })('expression-story-6878900', '/stories/Love-Dirty-Kinky-Chat/6878900', '', 'Story');

              </span>

            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6878900', 
     'Story',
      6878900,
      0
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);

        });

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6878900-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6878900-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6878900', 'respond-form-Story-6878900-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6878900-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6878900');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6878900', 'respond-form-Story-6878900');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6877210', '/stories/Love-Books/6877210', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <span class="likes">
            <span class="like-count has-likes" id="like-count-Story-6877210">
             <span class="count">
              1
             </span>
             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="likers">
              <span class="tooltip-text">
              </span>
              <span class="caret">
              </span>
             </span>
            </span>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6877210', 
     'Story',
      6877210,
      1
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

          //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6877210-join-group-toggle', '8511');

          <input id="" name="_csrf" type="hidden" value="31971ece466da267ead7f8d426696852"/>
          <span class="ep-form-status-msg ">
          </span>
          <div class="form-content">
           <input name="modelType" type="hidden" value="Story"/>
           <input name="modelId" type="hidden" value="6877210"/>
           <input class="action" name="action" type="hidden" value="like"/>
           <button class="icon-btn" title="Heart">
           </button>
          </div>
          <div class="form-actions">
          </div>
         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6877210-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6877210-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6877210', 'respond-form-Story-6877210-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6877210-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6877210');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6877210', 'respond-form-Story-6877210');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6873088', '/stories/Love-My-Girlfriend/6873088', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>

            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6873088', 
     'Story',
      6873088,
      1
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6873088-join-group-toggle', '3821');

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6873088-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>
