           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6873088-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6873088', 'respond-form-Story-6873088-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6873088-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6873088');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6873088', 'respond-form-Story-6873088');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>

          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6870879', '/stories/Have-A-Fantasy-I-Want-To-Fulfill/6870879', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;

            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6870879', 
     'Story',
      6870879,
      1
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6870879-join-group-toggle', '668914');

           <input name="modelType" type="hidden" value="Story"/>

          </div>
         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6870879-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6870879-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6870879', 'respond-form-Story-6870879-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6870879-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6870879');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6870879', 'respond-form-Story-6870879');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6866111', '/stories/Love-Stephen-King-Novels/6866111', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>

            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6866111', 
     'Story',
      6866111,
      3
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

          //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6866111-join-group-toggle', '22981');

         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6866111-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6866111-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6866111', 'respond-form-Story-6866111-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6866111-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6866111');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6866111', 'respond-form-Story-6866111');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6863104', '/stories/Love-Great-Lyrics/6863104', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;

            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6863104', 
     'Story',
      6863104,
      1
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6863104-join-group-toggle', '823445');

          </div>
         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6863104-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6863104-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6863104', 'respond-form-Story-6863104-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6863104-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6863104');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6863104', 'respond-form-Story-6863104');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>

          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6859821', '/stories/Love-Books/6859821', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>

            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6859821', 
     'Story',
      6859821,
      0
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

          //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6859821-join-group-toggle', '8511');
  //]]&gt;

         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6859821-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6859821-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6859821', 'respond-form-Story-6859821-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6859821-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6859821');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6859821', 'respond-form-Story-6859821');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6857395', '/stories/Love-Fantasy/6857395', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>

             <span class="count">
              3
             </span>

              </span>

            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6857395', 
     'Story',
      6857395,
      3
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

          //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6857395-join-group-toggle', '142262');

           <input name="modelType" type="hidden" value="Story"/>

          </div>
         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6857395-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

              Not a member?
              <span class="show-registration-form-button trigger">
               Sign Up

             </div>

             </div>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6857395-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6857395', 'respond-form-Story-6857395-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6857395-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6857395');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6857395', 'respond-form-Story-6857395');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>

                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);

                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6856253', '/stories/Want-To-Share-A-Sexual-Fantasy/6856253', '', 'Story');

            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6856253', 
     'Story',
      6856253,
      1
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6856253-join-group-toggle', '776079');

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6856253-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6856253-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6856253', 'respond-form-Story-6856253-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6856253-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6856253');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6856253', 'respond-form-Story-6856253');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>

            });
        })('expression-story-6855949', '/stories/Want-To-Share-A-Sexual-Fantasy/6855949', '', 'Story');

            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6855949', 
     'Story',
      6855949,
      3
  );
  
//]]&gt;

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6855949-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6855949-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6855949', 'respond-form-Story-6855949-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6855949-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6855949');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6855949', 'respond-form-Story-6855949');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>

                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6855759', '/stories/Love-Reading-Books/6855759', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>

            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6855759', 
     'Story',
      6855759,
      0
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6855759-join-group-toggle', '22845');

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6855759-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6855759-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6855759', 'respond-form-Story-6855759-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6855759-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6855759');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6855759', 'respond-form-Story-6855759');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>

                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6854643', '/stories/Have-A-Fantasy-I-Want-To-Fulfill/6854643', '', 'Story');

            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6854643', 
     'Story',
      6854643,
      7
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6854643-join-group-toggle', '668914');

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6854643-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6854643-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6854643', 'respond-form-Story-6854643-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6854643-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6854643');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6854643', 'respond-form-Story-6854643');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>

                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6846290', '/stories/Fell-In-Love-With-My-Professor/6846290', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;

            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6846290', 
     'Story',
      6846290,
      0
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6846290-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6846290-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6846290', 'respond-form-Story-6846290-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6846290-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6846290');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6846290', 'respond-form-Story-6846290');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>

                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6846114', '/stories/Fell-In-Love-With-Someone-I-Cant-Have/6846114', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;

            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6846114', 
     'Story',
      6846114,
      2
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6846114-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>
