           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6846114-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6846114', 'respond-form-Story-6846114-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6846114-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6846114');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6846114', 'respond-form-Story-6846114');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>

            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6845906', 
     'Story',
      6845906,
      0
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6845906-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6845906-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6845906', 'respond-form-Story-6845906-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6845906-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6845906');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6845906', 'respond-form-Story-6845906');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="expression story-expression backfill is-link " id="expression-story-6840726">

                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6840726', '/stories/Love-Jodi-Picoults-Novels/6840726', '', 'Story');

             <span class="count">
              1
             </span>
             <span class="icon">
             </span>

              </span>

              </span>
             </span>
            </span>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6840726', 
     'Story',
      6840726,
      1
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6840726-join-group-toggle', '31525');

           <input name="modelType" type="hidden" value="Story"/>

           <input class="action" name="action" type="hidden" value="like"/>

           </button>

          </div>
         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6840726-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6840726-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6840726', 'respond-form-Story-6840726-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6840726-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6840726');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6840726', 'respond-form-Story-6840726');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="expression story-expression backfill is-link " id="expression-story-6831073">
        <div class="expression-content">
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {

                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6831073', '/stories/Love-Clippers/6831073', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>

            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6831073', 
     'Story',
      6831073,
      13
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6831073-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6831073-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6831073', 'respond-form-Story-6831073-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6831073-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6831073');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6831073', 'respond-form-Story-6831073');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="expression story-expression backfill is-link " id="expression-story-6828430">

                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);

                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6828430', '/stories/Love-Reading-Books/6828430', '', 'Story');

              </span>

            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6828430', 
     'Story',
      6828430,
      4
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

                $(domId).addClassName('joined');

        });

            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');

          </div>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6828430-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6828430-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6828430', 'respond-form-Story-6828430-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6828430-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6828430');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6828430', 'respond-form-Story-6828430');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>

            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6823219', 
     'Story',
      6823219,
      3
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6823219-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6823219-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6823219', 'respond-form-Story-6823219-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6823219-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6823219');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6823219', 'respond-form-Story-6823219');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="expression story-expression backfill is-link " id="expression-story-6820071">
        <div class="expression-content">
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6820071', '/stories/Have-A-Fat-Fantasy/6820071', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>

            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6820071', 
     'Story',
      6820071,
      2
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

                $(domId).addClassName('joined');

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6820071-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6820071-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6820071', 'respond-form-Story-6820071-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6820071-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6820071');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6820071', 'respond-form-Story-6820071');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="expression story-expression backfill is-link " id="expression-story-6819927">
        <div class="expression-content">
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6819927', '/stories/Love-Playing-Video-Games/6819927', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>
         <div class="title">

            <span class="like-count has-likes" id="like-count-Story-6819927">
             <span class="count">
              2
             </span>
             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="likers">
              <span class="tooltip-text">
              </span>
              <span class="caret">
              </span>
             </span>
            </span>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6819927', 
     'Story',
      6819927,
      2
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

          //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6819927-join-group-toggle', '2241');

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6819927-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6819927-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6819927', 'respond-form-Story-6819927-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6819927-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6819927');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6819927', 'respond-form-Story-6819927');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="expression story-expression backfill is-link " id="expression-story-6819506">
        <div class="expression-content">
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6819506', '/stories/Love-Song-Lyrics/6819506', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>
         <div class="title">
          <a href="/stories/Love-Song-Lyrics/6819506">
           I Love Song Lyrics
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="content">
          There you stood, that'll teach her
To look so good and feel so right
Let me tell you about
The girl I met last night

It's understood, I had to reach her
I let the wheel of fortune...
         </div>

          <span class="member">

             <span class="count">
              2

              </span>

            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6819506', 
     'Story',
      6819506,
      2
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

          //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6819506-join-group-toggle', '142645');
  //]]&gt;

           <input name="modelType" type="hidden" value="Story"/>
           <input name="modelId" type="hidden" value="6819506"/>
           <input class="action" name="action" type="hidden" value="like"/>

           </button>

          </div>
         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6819506-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6819506-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6819506', 'respond-form-Story-6819506-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6819506-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6819506');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6819506', 'respond-form-Story-6819506');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="expression story-expression backfill is-link " id="expression-story-6816799">
        <div class="expression-content">
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6816799', '/stories/Am-Into-Sci-fi-And-Fantasy/6816799', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>
         <div class="title">
          <a href="/stories/Am-Into-Sci-fi-And-Fantasy/6816799">
           I Am Into Sci-fi and Fantasy
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="content">
          Yes. I love Star Trek, Star Wars, Harry Potter, and lots of others. I guess why I love Star Trek is because of Spock and Wesley. But I love all the action and going to planets with...
         </div>
         <div class="foot">
          <span class="member">
           <a class="member-image story-expression backfill is-link " href="http://www.experienceproject.com/about/wesleycrusher" mid="" title="WesleyCrusher">
            <img alt="WesleyCrusher" height="70" src="http://m.epcdn.net/member_ups/d83/wseot02v2b.jpg" width="75"/>
           </a>
           <span class="member-username-with-status">

           <span class="likes">
            <span class="like-count has-likes" id="like-count-Story-6816799">
             <span class="count">
              3
             </span>
             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="likers">
              <span class="tooltip-text">
              </span>
              <span class="caret">
              </span>
             </span>
            </span>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6816799', 
     'Story',
      6816799,
      3
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

          //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6816799-join-group-toggle', '134195');

           <input name="modelType" type="hidden" value="Story"/>
           <input name="modelId" type="hidden" value="6816799"/>
           <input class="action" name="action" type="hidden" value="like"/>
           <button class="icon-btn" title="Heart">
           </button>

          </div>
         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6816799-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6816799-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6816799', 'respond-form-Story-6816799-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6816799-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6816799');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6816799', 'respond-form-Story-6816799');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="expression story-expression backfill is-link " id="expression-story-6815407">
        <div class="expression-content">
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6815407', '/stories/Love-Listening-To-Music/6815407', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>
         <div class="title">
          <a href="/stories/Love-Listening-To-Music/6815407">
           I Love Listening to Music
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="content">
          I love the feeling of first meeting, the butterflies, the anticipation, the excitement....even in a fantasy.
         </div>

            <span class="like-count has-likes" id="like-count-Story-6815407">
             <span class="count">
              1
             </span>
             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="likers">
              <span class="tooltip-text">
              </span>
              <span class="caret">
              </span>
             </span>
            </span>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6815407', 
     'Story',
      6815407,
      1
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6815407-join-group-toggle', '2223');

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6815407-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>
