          //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6800490-join-group-toggle', '449283');

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6800490-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6800490-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6800490', 'respond-form-Story-6800490-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6800490-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6800490');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6800490', 'respond-form-Story-6800490');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="expression story-expression backfill is-link " id="expression-story-6800162">

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6800162', '/stories/Am-A-Writer-Of-Poetry-Short-Stories-And-Novels/6800162', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>
         <div class="title">
          <a href="/stories/Am-A-Writer-Of-Poetry-Short-Stories-And-Novels/6800162">
           I Am a Writer of Poetry, Short Stories and Novels
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="content">
          and i fall in love with my characters,cry for them,laugh for them and i even wish good luck to them while i know that their future and destiny is in my hands!!!! when you begin...

           <span class="likes">
            <span class="like-count has-likes" id="like-count-Story-6800162">
             <span class="count">
              3
             </span>
             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="likers">
              <span class="tooltip-text">
              </span>
              <span class="caret">
              </span>
             </span>
            </span>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6800162', 
     'Story',
      6800162,
      3
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>
           </span>

            <span class="model-create-date">
             Jun 24
            </span>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6800162-join-group-toggle', '127084');
  //]]&gt;

          <input id="" name="_csrf" type="hidden" value="31971ece466da267ead7f8d426696852"/>
          <span class="ep-form-status-msg ">
          </span>
          <div class="form-content">
           <input name="modelType" type="hidden" value="Story"/>
           <input name="modelId" type="hidden" value="6800162"/>
           <input class="action" name="action" type="hidden" value="like"/>
           <button class="icon-btn" title="Heart">
           </button>
          </div>
          <div class="form-actions">
          </div>
         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6800162-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6800162-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6800162', 'respond-form-Story-6800162-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6800162-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6800162');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6800162', 'respond-form-Story-6800162');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="expression story-expression backfill is-link " id="expression-story-6796845">
        <div class="expression-content">
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6796845', '/stories/Want-To-Live-In-A-Fantasy-World/6796845', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>
         <div class="title">
          <a href="/stories/Want-To-Live-In-A-Fantasy-World/6796845">
           I Want to Live In a Fantasy World
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="content">
          I want to live in a different reality.  One where I am a little more outgoing and understand the process of making friends.  A reality where on a day off work I would actually have...

          <span class="member">

           <span class="member-username-with-status">
            <a class="member-username " href="http://www.experienceproject.com/about/illusivelittleme" mid="-540106220" title="See IllusiveLittleMe's profile">

            <a class="member-premium-status " href="http://www.experienceproject.com/epsupporter" title="IllusiveLittleMe is an EP Supporter">

           </span>
           <span class="likes">
            <span class="like-count has-likes" id="like-count-Story-6796845">
             <span class="count">
              4
             </span>
             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="likers">
              <span class="tooltip-text">
              </span>
              <span class="caret">
              </span>
             </span>
            </span>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6796845', 
     'Story',
      6796845,
      4
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>
           </span>

            <span class="model-create-date">
             Jun 23

          //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6796845-join-group-toggle', '261002');

         <form action="http://www.experienceproject.com/ajax/like" class="like-button-form like-story-form" enctype="" id="like-story-6796845-button-form" method="post">
          <input id="" name="_csrf" type="hidden" value="31971ece466da267ead7f8d426696852"/>

          </span>
          <div class="form-content">
           <input name="modelType" type="hidden" value="Story"/>
           <input name="modelId" type="hidden" value="6796845"/>
           <input class="action" name="action" type="hidden" value="like"/>
           <button class="icon-btn" title="Heart">
           </button>
          </div>
          <div class="form-actions">
          </div>
         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6796845-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6796845-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6796845', 'respond-form-Story-6796845-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6796845-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6796845');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6796845', 'respond-form-Story-6796845');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="expression story-expression backfill is-link " id="expression-story-6796833">
        <div class="expression-content">
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6796833', '/stories/Love-Poetry/6796833', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>
         <div class="title">
          <a href="/stories/Love-Poetry/6796833">
           I Love Poetry
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="content">
          Another week has come around again
I'm stuck in the same old place
Same old faces watching me
Who knows how long I'll have to stay

Sometimes I drift away
From all the dull routine...
         </div>

           <span class="likes">
            <span class="like-count has-likes" id="like-count-Story-6796833">
             <span class="count">
              2
             </span>
             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="likers">
              <span class="tooltip-text">
              </span>
              <span class="caret">
              </span>
             </span>
            </span>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6796833', 
     'Story',
      6796833,
      2
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>
           </span>

             Jun 23

    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6796833-join-group-toggle', '796');

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6796833-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6796833-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6796833', 'respond-form-Story-6796833-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6796833-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6796833');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6796833', 'respond-form-Story-6796833');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6791989', '/stories/Love-Nabakovs-Lolita/6791989', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>

            <span class="like-count " id="like-count-Story-6791989">
             <span class="count">
              0
             </span>
             <span class="icon">

             <span class="likers">

              <span class="caret">
              </span>
             </span>
            </span>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6791989', 
     'Story',
      6791989,
      0
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>
           </span>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6791989-join-group-toggle', '739423');
  //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
        <div class="interactions ep-button-bar ">
         <form action="http://www.experienceproject.com/ajax/like" class="like-button-form like-story-form" enctype="" id="like-story-6791989-button-form" method="post">
          <input id="" name="_csrf" type="hidden" value="31971ece466da267ead7f8d426696852"/>
          <span class="ep-form-status-msg ">
          </span>
          <div class="form-content">
           <input name="modelType" type="hidden" value="Story"/>
           <input name="modelId" type="hidden" value="6791989"/>
           <input class="action" name="action" type="hidden" value="like"/>
           <button class="icon-btn" title="Heart">
           </button>
          </div>
          <div class="form-actions">
          </div>
         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6791989-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6791989-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6791989', 'respond-form-Story-6791989-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6791989-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6791989');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6791989', 'respond-form-Story-6791989');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="expression story-expression backfill is-link " id="expression-story-6791286">
        <div class="expression-content">
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6791286', '/stories/Am-A-Writer-Of-Poetry-Short-Stories-And-Novels/6791286', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>
         <div class="title">
          <a href="/stories/Am-A-Writer-Of-Poetry-Short-Stories-And-Novels/6791286">
           I Am a Writer of Poetry, Short Stories and Novels
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="content">
          Misguided Quest

Who would've thought I could change the world? What about the parrot? Yes, I admit it-the world we now live in is my fault...though the parrot isn't without blame...
         </div>

          <span class="member">
           <a class="member-image story-expression backfill is-link " href="http://www.experienceproject.com/about/zydeko" mid="" title="zydeko">

           </a>
           <span class="member-username-with-status">
            <a class="member-username " href="http://www.experienceproject.com/about/zydeko" mid="818613622" title="See zydeko's profile">
             zydeko

            <a class="member-premium-status " href="http://www.experienceproject.com/epsupporter" title="zydeko is an EP Supporter">

           <span class="likes">
            <span class="like-count " id="like-count-Story-6791286">
             <span class="count">
              0
             </span>
             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="likers">
              <span class="tooltip-text">
              </span>
              <span class="caret">
              </span>
             </span>
            </span>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6791286', 
     'Story',
      6791286,
      0
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>
           </span>

            <span class="model-create-date">
             Jun 22
            </span>

           </span>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6791286-join-group-toggle', '127084');
  //]]&gt;
         </script>

         <form action="http://www.experienceproject.com/ajax/like" class="like-button-form like-story-form" enctype="" id="like-story-6791286-button-form" method="post">
          <input id="" name="_csrf" type="hidden" value="31971ece466da267ead7f8d426696852"/>
          <span class="ep-form-status-msg ">
          </span>
          <div class="form-content">
           <input name="modelType" type="hidden" value="Story"/>
           <input name="modelId" type="hidden" value="6791286"/>
           <input class="action" name="action" type="hidden" value="like"/>
           <button class="icon-btn" title="Heart">
           </button>
          </div>
          <div class="form-actions">
          </div>
         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6791286-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6791286-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6791286', 'respond-form-Story-6791286-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6791286-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6791286');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6791286', 'respond-form-Story-6791286');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="expression story-expression backfill is-link " id="expression-story-6791273">
        <div class="expression-content">
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6791273', '/stories/Write-Novels-And-Short-Story-Books/6791273', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>
         <div class="title">
          <a href="/stories/Write-Novels-And-Short-Story-Books/6791273">
           I Write Novels And Short Story Books
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="content">
          Misguided Quest

Who would've thought I could change the world? What about the parrot? Yes, I admit it-the world we now live in is my fault...though the parrot isn't without blame...
         </div>

          <span class="member">
           <a class="member-image story-expression backfill is-link " href="http://www.experienceproject.com/about/zydeko" mid="" title="zydeko">

           </a>
           <span class="member-username-with-status">
            <a class="member-username " href="http://www.experienceproject.com/about/zydeko" mid="818613622" title="See zydeko's profile">
             zydeko

            <a class="member-premium-status " href="http://www.experienceproject.com/epsupporter" title="zydeko is an EP Supporter">
            </a>
            <span class="user-online-status offline" title="">

             18-21

           <span class="likes">
            <span class="like-count " id="like-count-Story-6791273">
             <span class="count">
              0
             </span>
             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="likers">
              <span class="tooltip-text">
              </span>
              <span class="caret">
              </span>
             </span>
            </span>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6791273', 
     'Story',
      6791273,
      0
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>
           </span>

            <span class="model-create-date">
             Jun 22
            </span>

          //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6791273-join-group-toggle', '545105');

         <form action="http://www.experienceproject.com/ajax/like" class="like-button-form like-story-form" enctype="" id="like-story-6791273-button-form" method="post">
          <input id="" name="_csrf" type="hidden" value="31971ece466da267ead7f8d426696852"/>
          <span class="ep-form-status-msg ">
          </span>
          <div class="form-content">
           <input name="modelType" type="hidden" value="Story"/>
           <input name="modelId" type="hidden" value="6791273"/>
           <input class="action" name="action" type="hidden" value="like"/>
           <button class="icon-btn" title="Heart">
           </button>
          </div>
          <div class="form-actions">
          </div>
         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6791273-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6791273-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6791273', 'respond-form-Story-6791273-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6791273-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6791273');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6791273', 'respond-form-Story-6791273');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="expression story-expression backfill is-link " id="expression-story-6789724">
        <div class="expression-content">
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6789724', '/stories/Am-A-Writer-Of-Poetry-Short-Stories-And-Novels/6789724', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>
         <div class="title">
          <a href="/stories/Am-A-Writer-Of-Poetry-Short-Stories-And-Novels/6789724">
           I Am a Writer of Poetry, Short Stories and Novels
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="content">
          (A little thing I did for a contest) 

Heavy is the burden of the pain hidden away in a heart, for it isnt fleeting like our time. Withered away is the boldness of the youth...
         </div>

           <span class="likes">
            <span class="like-count has-likes" id="like-count-Story-6789724">
             <span class="count">
              2
             </span>
             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="likers">
              <span class="tooltip-text">
              </span>
              <span class="caret">
              </span>
             </span>
            </span>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6789724', 
     'Story',
      6789724,
      2
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>
           </span>

            <span class="model-create-date">
             Jun 22

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6789724-join-group-toggle', '127084');
  //]]&gt;
         </script>

          <span class="ep-form-status-msg ">
          </span>
          <div class="form-content">
           <input name="modelType" type="hidden" value="Story"/>
           <input name="modelId" type="hidden" value="6789724"/>
           <input class="action" name="action" type="hidden" value="like"/>
           <button class="icon-btn" title="Heart">
           </button>
          </div>
          <div class="form-actions">
          </div>
         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6789724-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6789724-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6789724', 'respond-form-Story-6789724-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6789724-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6789724');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6789724', 'respond-form-Story-6789724');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>

          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6788690', '/stories/Love-Visual-Novels/6788690', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>

            <span class="like-count has-likes" id="like-count-Story-6788690">
             <span class="count">
              1
             </span>
             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="likers">
              <span class="tooltip-text">
              </span>
              <span class="caret">
              </span>
             </span>
            </span>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6788690', 
     'Story',
      6788690,
      1
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

          //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6788690-join-group-toggle', '706637');
  //]]&gt;

          <div class="form-content">

         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6788690-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>
         <form action="http://www.experienceproject.com/ajax/respond" class="respond-form indicate-loading " enctype="" id="respond-form-Story-6788690" method="post">

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6788690-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6788690', 'respond-form-Story-6788690-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6788690-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6788690');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6788690', 'respond-form-Story-6788690');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6784955', '/stories/Want-To-Know-Your-Tickle-Fantasy/6784955', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>
