           <span class="likes">
            <span class="like-count has-likes" id="like-count-Story-6784955">
             <span class="count">
              1
             </span>
             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="likers">
              <span class="tooltip-text">
              </span>
              <span class="caret">
              </span>
             </span>
            </span>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6784955', 
     'Story',
      6784955,
      1
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>
           </span>

            <span class="model-create-date">
             Jun 20
            </span>

          //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6784955-join-group-toggle', '498724');
  //]]&gt;

          </span>
          <div class="form-content">
           <input name="modelType" type="hidden" value="Story"/>

           <button class="icon-btn" title="Heart">
           </button>
          </div>
          <div class="form-actions">
          </div>
         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6784955-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6784955-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6784955', 'respond-form-Story-6784955-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6784955-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6784955');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6784955', 'respond-form-Story-6784955');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>

          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6779183', '/stories/Have-A-Fantasy-I-Want-To-Fulfill/6779183', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <span class="likes">
            <span class="like-count has-likes" id="like-count-Story-6779183">
             <span class="count">
              3
             </span>
             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="likers">
              <span class="tooltip-text">
              </span>
              <span class="caret">
              </span>
             </span>
            </span>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6779183', 
     'Story',
      6779183,
      3
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>
           </span>

            <span class="model-create-date">
             Jun 19

          //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6779183-join-group-toggle', '668914');

          <input id="" name="_csrf" type="hidden" value="31971ece466da267ead7f8d426696852"/>
          <span class="ep-form-status-msg ">
          </span>
          <div class="form-content">
           <input name="modelType" type="hidden" value="Story"/>
           <input name="modelId" type="hidden" value="6779183"/>
           <input class="action" name="action" type="hidden" value="like"/>
           <button class="icon-btn" title="Heart">
           </button>
          </div>
          <div class="form-actions">
          </div>
         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6779183-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6779183', 'respond-form-Story-6779183-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6779183-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6779183');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6779183', 'respond-form-Story-6779183');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="expression story-expression backfill is-link " id="expression-story-6778557">

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6778557', '/stories/Love-These-Lyrics/6778557', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <span class="likes">
            <span class="like-count has-likes" id="like-count-Story-6778557">
             <span class="count">
              3
             </span>
             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="likers">
              <span class="tooltip-text">
              </span>
              <span class="caret">
              </span>
             </span>
            </span>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6778557', 
     'Story',
      6778557,
      3
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>
           </span>

            <span class="model-create-date">
             Jun 19

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6778557-join-group-toggle', '17036');
  //]]&gt;
         </script>

        <div class="interactions ep-button-bar ">
         <form action="http://www.experienceproject.com/ajax/like" class="like-button-form like-story-form" enctype="" id="like-story-6778557-button-form" method="post">
          <input id="" name="_csrf" type="hidden" value="31971ece466da267ead7f8d426696852"/>
          <span class="ep-form-status-msg ">
          </span>
          <div class="form-content">
           <input name="modelType" type="hidden" value="Story"/>
           <input name="modelId" type="hidden" value="6778557"/>
           <input class="action" name="action" type="hidden" value="like"/>
           <button class="icon-btn" title="Heart">
           </button>
          </div>
          <div class="form-actions">
          </div>
         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6778557-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>
         <form action="http://www.experienceproject.com/ajax/respond" class="respond-form indicate-loading " enctype="" id="respond-form-Story-6778557" method="post">
          <input id="" name="_csrf" type="hidden" value="31971ece466da267ead7f8d426696852"/>
          <h3 class="respond-form-title">

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6778557-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6778557', 'respond-form-Story-6778557-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6778557-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6778557');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6778557', 'respond-form-Story-6778557');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="expression story-expression backfill is-link " id="expression-story-6777555">
        <div class="expression-content">
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6777555', '/stories/Am-A-Writer-Of-Poetry-Short-Stories-And-Novels/6777555', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <span class="likes">
            <span class="like-count has-likes" id="like-count-Story-6777555">
             <span class="count">
              9
             </span>
             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="likers">
              <span class="tooltip-text">
              </span>
              <span class="caret">
              </span>
             </span>
            </span>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6777555', 
     'Story',
      6777555,
      9
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

            <span class="model-create-date">
             Jun 18

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6777555-join-group-toggle', '127084');
  //]]&gt;
         </script>

        <div class="interactions ep-button-bar ">
         <form action="http://www.experienceproject.com/ajax/like" class="like-button-form like-story-form" enctype="" id="like-story-6777555-button-form" method="post">
          <input id="" name="_csrf" type="hidden" value="31971ece466da267ead7f8d426696852"/>
          <span class="ep-form-status-msg ">
          </span>
          <div class="form-content">
           <input name="modelType" type="hidden" value="Story"/>
           <input name="modelId" type="hidden" value="6777555"/>
           <input class="action" name="action" type="hidden" value="like"/>
           <button class="icon-btn" title="Heart">
           </button>
          </div>
          <div class="form-actions">
          </div>
         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6777555-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>
         <form action="http://www.experienceproject.com/ajax/respond" class="respond-form indicate-loading " enctype="" id="respond-form-Story-6777555" method="post">
          <input id="" name="_csrf" type="hidden" value="31971ece466da267ead7f8d426696852"/>
          <h3 class="respond-form-title">

           <div class="reply-guidelines">
            Please respond with

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6777555-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6777555', 'respond-form-Story-6777555-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6777555-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6777555');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6777555', 'respond-form-Story-6777555');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="expression story-expression backfill is-link " id="expression-story-6776715">
        <div class="expression-content">
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6776715', '/stories/Fell-In-Love-With-My-Best-Friend/6776715', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>
         <div class="title">
          <a href="/stories/Fell-In-Love-With-My-Best-Friend/6776715">
           I Fell In Love With My Best Friend
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="content">
          I was just after being severely bullied by my best friends. My self esteem was non existent, I had no friends and I had no hope. She sat next to me one day in art class - not out...
         </div>
         <div class="foot">
          <span class="member">
           <a class="member-image story-expression backfill is-link " href="http://www.experienceproject.com/about/buto1" mid="" title="buto1">
            <img alt="buto1" height="175" src="http://m.epcdn.net/member_ups/avatar_female.jpg" width="175"/>
           </a>
           <span class="member-username-with-status">
            <a class="member-username " href="http://www.experienceproject.com/about/buto1" mid="-183056893" title="See buto1's profile">
             buto1
            </a>
            <a class="member-premium-status " href="http://www.experienceproject.com/epsupporter" title="buto1 is an EP Supporter">
            </a>
            <span class="user-online-status offline" title="">
            </span>
           </span>
           <span class="member-age-gender-abbreviated">
            <span class="age">
             18-21
            </span>
            <span class="gender">
             , F
            </span>
           </span>
          </span>

           <span class="responses">
           </span>
           <span class="likes">
            <span class="like-count has-likes" id="like-count-Story-6776715">
             <span class="count">
              2
             </span>
             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="likers">
              <span class="tooltip-text">
              </span>
              <span class="caret">
              </span>
             </span>
            </span>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6776715', 
     'Story',
      6776715,
      2
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>
           </span>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6776715-join-group-toggle', '27786');
  //]]&gt;
         </script>

         <form action="http://www.experienceproject.com/ajax/like" class="like-button-form like-story-form" enctype="" id="like-story-6776715-button-form" method="post">
          <input id="" name="_csrf" type="hidden" value="31971ece466da267ead7f8d426696852"/>
          <span class="ep-form-status-msg ">
          </span>
          <div class="form-content">
           <input name="modelType" type="hidden" value="Story"/>
           <input name="modelId" type="hidden" value="6776715"/>
           <input class="action" name="action" type="hidden" value="like"/>
           <button class="icon-btn" title="Heart">
           </button>
          </div>
          <div class="form-actions">
          </div>
         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6776715-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>
         <form action="http://www.experienceproject.com/ajax/respond" class="respond-form indicate-loading " enctype="" id="respond-form-Story-6776715" method="post">
          <input id="" name="_csrf" type="hidden" value="31971ece466da267ead7f8d426696852"/>

           <div class="cancel-or-submit">
            <span class="cancel-btn toggle-respond-form">
             Cancel
            </span>
            <div class="form-input-container -input-container submit-input-container" id="respond-form-Story-6776715">

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6776715-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6776715', 'respond-form-Story-6776715-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6776715-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6776715');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6776715', 'respond-form-Story-6776715');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6774170', '/stories/Am-In-Love-With-A-Fictional-Character/6774170', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>

            <span class="like-count " id="like-count-Story-6774170">
             <span class="count">
              0
             </span>
             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="likers">
              <span class="tooltip-text">
              </span>
              <span class="caret">
              </span>
             </span>
            </span>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6774170', 
     'Story',
      6774170,
      0
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6774170-join-group-toggle', '5320');

          <input id="" name="_csrf" type="hidden" value="31971ece466da267ead7f8d426696852"/>
          <span class="ep-form-status-msg ">
          </span>
          <div class="form-content">
           <input name="modelType" type="hidden" value="Story"/>
           <input name="modelId" type="hidden" value="6774170"/>
           <input class="action" name="action" type="hidden" value="like"/>
           <button class="icon-btn" title="Heart">
           </button>
          </div>
          <div class="form-actions">
          </div>
         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6774170-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6774170-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6774170', 'respond-form-Story-6774170-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6774170-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6774170');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6774170', 'respond-form-Story-6774170');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6774165', '/stories/Love-A-Christmas-Carol/6774165', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>

            <span class="like-count " id="like-count-Story-6774165">
             <span class="count">
              0
             </span>
             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="likers">
              <span class="tooltip-text">
              </span>
              <span class="caret">
              </span>
             </span>
            </span>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6774165', 
     'Story',
      6774165,
      0
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

            <span class="model-create-date">

          //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6774165-join-group-toggle', '161572');

          <input id="" name="_csrf" type="hidden" value="31971ece466da267ead7f8d426696852"/>
          <span class="ep-form-status-msg ">
          </span>
          <div class="form-content">
           <input name="modelType" type="hidden" value="Story"/>
           <input name="modelId" type="hidden" value="6774165"/>
           <input class="action" name="action" type="hidden" value="like"/>
           <button class="icon-btn" title="Heart">
           </button>
          </div>
          <div class="form-actions">
          </div>
         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6774165-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6774165-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6774165', 'respond-form-Story-6774165-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6774165-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6774165');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6774165', 'respond-form-Story-6774165');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="expression story-expression backfill is-link " id="expression-story-6773263">

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6773263', '/stories/D-Like-To-Make-Love-With-A-Girl-Who-Massages-Me/6773263', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>

         <div class="content">

             <span class="count">

             </span>
             <span class="icon">

              </span>

            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6773263', 
     'Story',
      6773263,
      4
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

          //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6773263-join-group-toggle', '416925');

          <input id="" name="_csrf" type="hidden" value="31971ece466da267ead7f8d426696852"/>
          <span class="ep-form-status-msg ">
          </span>
          <div class="form-content">
           <input name="modelType" type="hidden" value="Story"/>
           <input name="modelId" type="hidden" value="6773263"/>
           <input class="action" name="action" type="hidden" value="like"/>
           <button class="icon-btn" title="Heart">
           </button>
          </div>
          <div class="form-actions">
          </div>
         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6773263-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6773263-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6773263', 'respond-form-Story-6773263-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6773263-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6773263');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6773263', 'respond-form-Story-6773263');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
        (function(domId, path, splitTestToLogClicks, modelType) {
        
            $(domId).on('click', '.expression-content', function(event, element) {
                if (splitTestToLogClicks) {
                    logSplitTestAction2(splitTestToLogClicks, 'user-clicked-expression-' + modelType);
                }
                window.location.href = path;
            });
        })('expression-story-6771899', '/stories/Want-To-Live-In-A-Fantasy-World/6771899', '', 'Story');
        
        
      //]]&gt;
         </script>

             <span class="count">
              0
             </span>
             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="likers">
              <span class="tooltip-text">
              </span>
              <span class="caret">
              </span>
             </span>
            </span>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
  
  (function(domId, modelType, modelId, numLikes) {
  
      EP.Event.on(EP.Event.like(modelType, modelId), function(serverResponse) {
          if (serverResponse.action == 'like') {
              numLikes += 1;
          } else if (serverResponse.action == 'unlike') {
              numLikes -= 1;
          }
  
          $(domId).down('.count').update(Math.max(numLikes, 0));
  
          if (numLikes &gt; 0) {
              $(domId).addClassName('has-likes');
          } else {
              $(domId).removeClassName('has-likes');
          }
      });
  
  })('like-count-Story-6771899', 
     'Story',
      6771899,
      0
  );
  
//]]&gt;
            </script>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function(domId, gid) {
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userJoinedGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).addClassName('flipped');
            _.delay(function() {
                $(domId).addClassName('joined');
            }, 300);
            //new EP.member.VolunteerEligibilityCheck();
        });
    
        EP.Event.on(EP.Event.userLeftGroup(gid), function() {
            $(domId).removeClassName('flipped joined');
        });
    
    })('expression-story-6771899-join-group-toggle', '261002');
  //]]&gt;

          <input id="" name="_csrf" type="hidden" value="31971ece466da267ead7f8d426696852"/>
          <span class="ep-form-status-msg ">
          </span>
          <div class="form-content">
           <input name="modelType" type="hidden" value="Story"/>
           <input name="modelId" type="hidden" value="6771899"/>
           <input class="action" name="action" type="hidden" value="like"/>
           <button class="icon-btn" title="Heart">
           </button>
          </div>
          <div class="form-actions">
          </div>
         </form>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
      (function(domId) {
          var form = new EP.ui.form.RequireLoginAjaxForm(domId, {
              onSuccess: function(transport) {
                  var response = transport.responseJSON;
      
                  if (response.success) {
      
                      if (response.action == 'like') {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('unlike');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Unheart');
                      } else {
                          $(domId).down('.action').setValue('like');
                          $(domId).down('.icon-btn').writeAttribute('title', 'Heart');
                      }
      
                      $(domId).toggleClassName('unlike');
      
      
                      // this event is used to update the UI in other parts of the page
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.like(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                  }
      
              }
          });
      })('like-story-6771899-button-form');
      
    //]]&gt;
         </script>

           <form action="http://www.experienceproject.com/ajax/registration/registration.php" class="registration-form" enctype="multipart/form-data" id="respond-form-Story-6771899-reg-form" method="post">
            <span class="general-status-msg status-msg ep-form-status-msg">

           <script type="text/javascript">
            //&lt;![CDATA[
  // the login form is inside an iframe so in order to switch to the registration form,
  // we need to get the registration form from the parent window
  (function (formId) {
      var registerLink = $(formId).down('.show-registration-form-button');
      if (registerLink) {
          registerLink.observe('click', function() {
              var overlay = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay');
              if (overlay) {
                  overlay.removeClassName('show-login-form').addClassName('show-registration-form');
                  epplatform.ui.scroll.ScrollingFunctions.makeElementVisible(overlay);
                  var registrationForm = overlay.down('form');
                  registrationForm.findFirstElement().activate();
              }
          });
      }
  
      var submitButton = $(formId).down('.ep-button-submit');
      if (submitButton) {
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
          if (iframe) {
              iframe.setStyle({opacity:1.0});
          }
          Event.observe(submitButton, 'click', function() {
              var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('register-or-login-overlay-ajax-login-frame');
              if (iframe) {
                  iframe.setStyle({opacity:0.5});
                  $(formId).down('.loading-indicator').setStyle({display:'inline-block'});
                  submitButton.setValue('Signing in...');
              }
          });
      }
  })('respond-form-Story-6771899-login-form');
  
//]]&gt;
           </script>
           <span class="toggler">
            Sign Up
           </span>
          </div>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
    (function (domId, registrationFormId, loginFormId, actionName) {
    
        new EP.ui.registration.RegistrationForm(registrationFormId, {
            showOnboardingOverlay: false,
            onRegistrationSuccess : function() {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('register-for-'+actionName);
            },
            ref : window.location.href
        });
    
        new EP.ui.auth.LoginForm(loginFormId, {
            onLoginSuccess: function(response) {
                EP.Event.trigger('auth-for-'+actionName);
                EP.Event.trigger('login-for-'+actionName);
            }
        });
    
        $(domId).select('.toggler').invoke('observe', 'click', function(event) {
            $(domId).toggleClassName('register').toggleClassName('login');
        });
    
    })('register-or-login-for-respond-form-Story-6771899', 'respond-form-Story-6771899-reg-form', 'respond-form-Story-6771899-login-form', 'respond-form-Story-6771899');
    
  //]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          //&lt;![CDATA[
          
          (function (domId, respondFormId) {
              var respondForm = new EP.ui.interaction.RespondForm(respondFormId, {
                  onPostSuccess: function(response, form) {
                      EP.Event.trigger(EP.Event.respond(response.modelType, response.modelId), response);
                      var successStatusMsg = "Your response has been posted! &lt;a href='" + response.redirect + "'&gt;See it here.&lt;/a&gt;";
                      form.setStatusMsg(response.success ? successStatusMsg : response.statusMsg);
                  },
                  onTextareaFocus: function(form) {
                      if (!EP.Auth.isLoggedIn) {
                          $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').addClassName('expanded');
                      }
                  }
              });
          
              // no label next to text input, so we need to add placeholder support for IE
              EP.ui.form.FormUtil.setPlaceholders(respondFormId);
          
              //event thrown by register-or-login-for-action.html.haml
              EP.Event.on('auth-for-'+respondFormId, function() {
                  respondForm.submit();
                  $(domId).down('.register-or-login-for-action').removeClassName('expanded');
              });
          
          })('expression-story-6771899', 'respond-form-Story-6771899');
        //]]&gt;
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>
